description: This file defines an asynchronous function generateSOWFromPrompt for generating a Statement of Work (SOW) based on a user prompt. It attempts to use a local backend endpoint first, with a fallback to OpenAI's API if configured, handling errors and environment variables accordingly.
external_files: fetch API (built-in, no external file dependency)

methods.name: generateSOWFromPrompt(promptText)
methods.description: An async function that generates a SOW draft from a given prompt, first trying a local backend and falling back to OpenAI API if configured.
